course.subject: FINA
course.name: Wealth Management
course.description: This course covers the process of financial planning with a focus on the process of investment advisory.  It will explore portfolio management topics from the financial advisor's perspective, and discuss client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues.  Ethical practices of financial planning will also be discussed.  This course aims to prepare students to be investment professionals in the areas of private banking and asset management.
